fm: Added 16 missing role entries to context-manifest.json: analyze, fe-architect, fe-lead, fe-senior, fe-dev, fe-tester, fe-qa, fe-qa-code, ux-architect, ux-lead, ux-senior, ux-dev, ux-tester, ux-qa, ux-qa-code.
